titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4471) to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 with respect to the activities of the Overseas Private Investment Corporation, to make supplemental authorizations of appropriations for the Board for International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-615.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4471 (Overseas Private Investment Corporation activities and Board for International Broadcasting funding).
